requirements.cpu_arch: Linux x86-64, ARM 32/64, Windows x86-64, IBM POWER8, x86/i686

services.name: redmine-server
services.description_en: Browser access to Redmine by http

faqs.question_cn: 启动Redmine前需要更改密码吗？
faqs.answer_cn: 是的, 在生产环境中，您应该在docker compose文件中修改所有数据库密码和应用程序密码
faqs.question_en: Do I need to change the password before docker-compose up?
faqs.answer_en: Yes, you should modify all database password and application password at docker-compose file for production

faqs.question_cn: Redmine默认的用户名和密码是什么？
faqs.answer_cn: 请参照[docker-compose file](docker-compose-production.yml)的上方注释区域
faqs.question_en: What the default username and password?
faqs.answer_en: Refer to comment area at the top of docker-compose file
